entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor button events not firing on MAUI Hybrid project after .NET 8 Preview 7 package update #16616
  • new MAUI App project, Nuget dependencies are not being restored #16615
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] MAUI ios and maccatalyst don't build #16612
  • Web Inspector cannot use app #16611
  • [regression/8.0.100-preview.7.23376.3] .NET Maui Blazor App throws "No interop methods are registered for renderer" javascript exception #16609
  • Need a way to synchronize a page dispose before a new page starts #16608
  • Variable font support #16604
    Backlog
  • Webauthenticator Apple Sign in #16602
  • [regression/7.0.81] Strange padding problem using grid #16598
    .NET 8 GA
  • app terminates on startup #16594

Closed

  • ffff #16595
  • .net 7 and .net 8 Push notification set up - issue with Xamarin.GooglePlayServices.Base #16448
  • Release 7.0.92 rollback json refers to non exiting packages #16557
  • Error CS0246 on iOS namespaces when using Conditional Compilation #16544

PullRequests

Created

  • [ios] fix memory leak in SwipeItem #16614
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [Housekeeping] Add 8.0 preview 7 to bug report template #16613
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, Task
  • Update Windows App SDK #16610
  • [ios] fix memory leak in GraphicsView #16605
    area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [iOS] Added DeviceTest to validate CharacterSpacing on Button #16603
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [X] Support DynResources as AppThemeBinding values #16597
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Windows] Notify Shell tab title changes #16593
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16592
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [WinUI] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16213
    area/desktop 🖥️, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix Graphics Font comparison method #15985
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration
  • Move powershell pack script into cake #16588
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Document Element #16299
    area/docs 📓, backport/suggested, .NET 8

Updated

  • Add property for tapping on page to close soft input keyboard #16530
    area/keyboard
  • Implement Additional PointerGestureRecognizer Platform Arguments #16426
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • Locate MAUI View for PlatformView #16463
    area/architecture
  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Display alerts on top of popups #16581
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, .NET 8 GA
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak in DatePicker #16589
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, memory-leak 💦
  • Adds prompts when creating a new page. #16331
    community ✨, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • Wrong scroll with shell and entry and safe area #16339
  • Add doc comments for common types used in templates, maps, webview #16552
    area/docs 📓, t/docs 📝, .NET 8 GA
  • [C] fix Specificity for VSM #16404
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 GA
  • [ios] test MemoryAnalyzers package #16346
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • [X] Optimize OnPlatform element syntax #5611
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, Under Consideration
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️
  • Import Keyboard Extension APIs #16572
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • Add Position property to DragStartingEventArgs and DragEventArgs #16335
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix issue setting CarouselView position on Ctor or Appearing #16165
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image
  • [iOS] Fix ScrollTo method issues #15984
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, layout-scrollview, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • Add MaxLength limit to cursor position updates #15970
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry
